features: Memory Foam Seat Cushion: The BUFORT office seat cushion and lumbar support pillow features premium slow-rebound memory foam that adjusts to your body's curves for better support, reducing pressure on your coccyx and promoting healthy sitting potential. The mesh breathable cover provides good air circulation, so you won't feel stuffy or sweaty when you sit.

Say Goodbye to Coccyx Painful: An orthopedic doctor's recommendation - the perfect alternative to donuts and hemorrhoid pillows. The ergonomically designed U-shaped seat cushion keeps the hips and tailbone away from the hard seating surface, preventing pressure on the lower body, can effectively relieve sciatica, arthritis, lower back, hip, spine, post-operative injury or pregnancy pain relief, suitable for 150 - 250 lb crowd.

Extra Larger Size Back Cushion Pillow: BUFORT desk and chair back cushion has a larger support area than other brands. Simulating the human spine curve and takes on the natural contour shape of your back, providing a more comfortable force area for the back, and can be placed on the back of a car seat or office chair to relieve neck, upper, middle, chest, lower back and spine pain in any position.

Fits Any Chair Seat Cushion Combo: Both the seat cushion and backrest feature a non-slip rubber bottom to ensure they stay securely in the seat. Adjustable shoulder straps keep the back support pad in place and prevent the lumbar pillow from slipping. Perfect for most office chairs, gaming chairs, sofas, car seats, SUVs, trucks, wheelchairs and even on the go. The removable and washable cover keeps the cushion set clean and tidy at all times

Best Gift for Men & Women: The memory foam seat cushion and chair back cushion is the perfect gift for family and friends for Christmas, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Birthday, Wedding, Housewarming. If your loved one needs to sit for long hours at work or drive, give them this cushion set to experience unprecedented comfort and all-day relaxation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you troubled by painful back, waist, coccyx, and sciatica after sitting for a long time? We designed the seat cushion and lumbar support pillow specifically for your concerns. Stay away from pain and have a permanent comfortable life from the moment you choose Liffis memory foam back support pillow and coccyx seat cushion. High Density Memory Foam - Liffis seat cushion & lumbar support pillow set is made from premium-quality, thick pure memory foam to offer comfort, so that the cushion is resilient, supportive, won’t collect odors or discolor over time. It keeps its shape and never be flat.Ergonomically Designed U-Shaped Cushion - Relieve sciatica, disc herniation, tailbone injury, lumbar strain and other pains caused by prolonged sedentary.Multifunction - Best for office chair, car seat, computer desk, wheelchair, dining room chair, living room sofa, truck, train & airplane travel, couch, recliner, etc.
More Reasons to Choose Our Chair Cushions & Back Pillow - Large Size for Extra Comfort

Non-slip Bottom The bottom anti-slip design secures the seat cushion to any surface. Ideal for cushioning hard surfaces such as plastic chairs, stadium seats, airline seats, grandstands. Adjustable Straps Our adjustable shoulder straps hold the back cushion tightly to the seat back, can be adjusted to fit different chair backs and stay in the desired position without falling off the chair or slipping. Durable Zipper & Sashable Cover The removable washable cover is made of soft jacquard fabric to ensure comfort on your skin. The breathable mesh ensures enough ventilation and never feels stuffy again.
Perfect Festival Gifts & Birthday Gifts for Family & Friends & Lovers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Is a very good product, material is really good, is a good size for wide butt…. lol. It holds weight of body very well. I am satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As comfortable as it can get
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ★★★★★ (5/5)In the realm of ergonomic solutions, the Seat Cushion & Lumbar Support Pillow combo has proven to be a game-changer for those seeking ultimate comfort and support during extended periods of sitting. This dynamic duo seamlessly integrates into any seating environment, providing a holistic approach to alleviating discomfort and promoting better posture.Seat Cushion: ★★★★★The seat cushion, a key component of this pairing, boasts an intelligently designed ergonomic shape that conforms to the natural curvature of the body. Crafted from high-density memory foam, it provides a perfect balance between firmness and plush comfort. This cushion has been a lifesaver for individuals spending long hours at a desk or behind the wheel, effectively reducing pressure on the tailbone and promoting a more comfortable seated position.Lumbar Support Pillow: ★★★★★The lumbar support pillow complements the seat cushion with its precision-engineered design that targets the lower back, an area often neglected in standard seating. This pillow, too, is filled with supportive memory foam, offering optimal lumbar alignment to mitigate the risks of slouching or lower back pain. The adjustable straps ensure a secure fit to any chair, making it a versatile solution for home, office, or even car seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hubby said the seat cushion is great, it takes a lot of pressure off his tailbone. But, the back cushion is not tall enough. Even with the strap on it he has to keep moving the cushion up to fit his back correctly. And he is only 5’10” tall.I like that the cover can be removed and washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Relieves Back Pain
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my husband's office chair. He is an avid gamer and needs a soft cushion. It relieves his lower back pain and is comfortable on the seat. He says it's the most comfortable cushion he has ever had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not as comfortable or as large as I would have liked but it takes some getting used to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
